content:
# Factorio Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(0,0)
Consists of steam engine(position 0,1), boiler(position 0,2) and offshore pump (position 0,3)

### Copper plate mine at position(1,0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position 1,1) and a furnace at position(1,2)
- Burner mining drill (position 1,3) and a furnace at position(1,4)
- Burner mining drill (position 1,5) and a furnace at position(1,6)

### Copper cable factory at position(2,0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position 2,1) and a furnace at position(2,2)
- Assembling machine at position(2,3) and inserter at position(2,4) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position 2,5) that connects the furnace at position 2,2 to assembling machine at position(2,3)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors related to missing resources for construction
- Check your inventory for required resources before attempting to place new structures.
